summary: The module defines data structures and utilities for handling fidelity bonds, including converting bond data to and from a compact binary format, creating cryptographic proof messages, and verifying those proofs using ECDSA signatures. It also provides helper routines for encoding/decoding messages and performing sanity checks on bond contents.
business_intent: To enable secure, verifiable commitments between participants by issuing and validating cryptographically signed fidelity bonds, thereby protecting against fraud and ensuring trust in peer‑to‑peer financial exchanges.
